data.message: Shady,I sure hope you get this because I know why Mariah Carey is so obsessed with us...Warning part two...,Why you so obsessed with us,hoe I want to know.I would rather slang than bang HIV,what's wrong Mariah,I mean Heather,you think I would fail to remember you cheated on me with a black cowboy toy and now you have more than one husband,bitch please,sit your meth using ass down and fuck nick,take out your dentures and suck my white dick,whoops not anymore dirty whore.You can try to sue me but i'll when,thank god you're out of my life and leave eminem alone cause you're the shady slut you make me sick to the gut....Fuck Mariah Carey,Heather  and Nick Cannon.Faggot,I stole your tramp and I was worth less than a 100 grand without a band.Why is she obsessed with us,dumb hoe I want to know...Em,you are my hero for warning part 1 and I hope you write a part two...
